div.p: The extent of permafrost in Northern Hemisphere when global average surface temperature rises to 1.5 and 2 °C above pre-industrial (1861–1880) under RCPs. (The orange and blue shaded regions represent the permafrost extent in 1986–2005 and the period corresponding to the certain threshold, respectively). (The NCAR Command Language (Version 6.3.0) [Software]. (2016). Boulder, Colorado: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/TDD. http://dx.doi.org/10.5065/D6WD3XH5).
